ygData.subject: Re: Newbie project stats
ygData.msgSnippet: ... lot of ... possible ... patiently and ... The level 19 invis song will only get you dead, fast, on the way to the Assassin room.  Almost every frog you ll
ygData.messageBody:
> How about this in the leaching catagory. The mask of deception, my
> understanding is that this rots a lot on most servers. I also see a
lot of
> lower level bards with one. When I have 19th level invis song is it
possible
> to get to the Assissin room (provided it's camped) and wait
patiently and
> politly for one to drop?


The level 19 invis song will only get you dead, fast, on the way to
the Assassin room. Almost every frog you'll see will be undead.
It's not tough to get to the Assassin room, but you will need invis
to undead. Unless, of course, lguk is super camped. On my server,
PreKunark you could walk anywhere you wanted on dead side lguk,
without fear of getting attacked - population averaged 90 - 100 most
nights. Now it's more like 65 - 75 and the frog's life expectancies
have climbed. :)
